field.name: summary
field.value: Can Not Build IBatisNet Facility From NAnt Build File

field.name: description
field.value:
When running the NAnt build file all.build from trunk, the iBatisNet facility's tests do not pass as of September 20, 2006. Please see the attachment for the NAnt/NUnit output.
The tests run fine using TestDriven.NET from Microsoft Visual Studio in the actual iBatisNet facility's solution.
I don't know iBatis; otherwise, I would have tried to find a fix for this. Of course, that won't stop me from trying later. I just got tired last night and don't have time this morning to dig into the internals of the facility.
